nodes.text: The Jantsk Mercenaries was a mercenary group based on the planet Endor. It was named after its leader, Vurrha Jantsk. During the Galactic Civil War, Jantsk and his mercenaries went to the Mid Rim planet of Naboo in order to attack Queen Kylantha's chambers. Unbeknownst to his men, Jantsk and his group had been hired by Emperor Palpatine himself for this mission. When the job was done, their leader was assassinated by an unidentified Imperial spacer on the Emperor's orders.
The Jantsk Mercenaries appeared in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
